[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/token.rs] [Function: uri()] [Length exploit] Can uri() return strings exceeding MAX_URI_LENGTH (512 chars) due to Move-Rust desync, causing truncation errors or buffer issues in URI parsers and HTTP libraries? (Low)
